summary:
Doubles the stat increases, removes health regen penalty, adds small frost resistance.
Now losing control is worth it.
Will add 2x, 3x, 4x version
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod that makes it worth it to go wolf mode.

Fortify Stamina 200       (from 100)
Fortify Health 100         (from 50)

Added
Resist Frost 15             

I also removed the health regen penalty.

Nice mod with that vanilla feel but helps a werewolf out alot.
author: rbfloat05
